entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Shoal Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:37 PM CST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -9.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Shoal Lake 10:00 PM CST Saturday 11 March 2023
Temperature: -9.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.3 kPa rising
Humidity: 72 %
Wind Chill: -17
Dewpoint: -13.6°C
Wind: NNE 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Local amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 near midnight. Low minus 14. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 11 March 2023
